title: Understanding the refrigeration requirements of the youth
selftext:
Hi guys!

This post is to understand refrigeration the requirements of the youth for my college project.

To make things easier for you guys and for me, I've made a survey form for you guys to fill.

It's a very interactive and quick form, will take you less than 4mins.

Here is the link to the survey:

https://sprw.io/stt-3CCgRiPeAKEHBwmWQUsytS

I hope you guys help me out with the survey :)
Thankyou ðŸ˜Š
